But when Bulstrode and his wrench shipment are delayed, it sends Bruno into an agitated tail-spin. To soothe their friend, the engines decide to pass the time by playing the ultimate Waiting Game and learning how to have fun while daydreaming, anticipating, and practicing patience!_
